text: The Safety Match () is a 1954 Soviet comedy movie directed by Konstantin Yudin.ШВЕДСКАЯ СПИЧКА (1954) It stars Alexey Gribov, Andrei Popov, and Mikhail Yanshin. == Actors == * Alexey Gribov as Magistrate Nikolai Yermolayevich Chudikov * Andrei Popov as Detective Emil Dyukovsky * Mikhail Yanshin as Police Capt. Yevgraf Kuzmich * Nikolai Gritsenko as Psekov, estate manager * Nikolai Kurochkin as Yefrem, majordomo * Vladimir Kolchin as Nikolai Tetekho * Tamara Nosova as Akulina == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Konstantin Yudin
title: The Safety Match
